DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/lo.description: Deletes a configured Zero Trust Gateway location.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

200.description: Delete a Zero Trust Gateway location response

success.description: Whether the API call was successful
Whether the API call was successful

4XX.description: Delete a Zero Trust Gateway location response failure

DELETE /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/lo.summary: Delete a Zero Trust Gateway location

GET /accounts/{account_id}/gateway/locat.description: Fetches Zero Trust Gateway locations for an account.

success.description: Whether the API call was successful

count.description: Total number of results for the requested service

page.description: Current page within paginated list of results

per_page.description: Number of results per page of results

total_count.description: Total results available without any search parameters

client_default.description: True if the location is the default location.

doh_subdomain.description: The DNS over HTTPS domain to send DNS requests to. This field is auto-generated by Gateway.

ecs_support.description: True if the location needs to resolve EDNS queries.

ip.description: IPV6 destination ip assigned to this location. DNS requests sent to this IP will counted as the request under this location. This field is auto-generated by Gateway.

networks.description: A list of network ranges that requests from this location would originate from.

network.description: The IPv4 address or IPv4 CIDR. IPv4 CIDRs are limited to a maximum of /24.
